abstract: George Vecsey Sports of The Times column contends New York Yankees Curtis Granderson’s two great catches against the Detroit Tigers put him in the category of fielders who have had epic moments in the playoffs.
snippet: Curtis Granderson’s two great catches against the Tigers on Tuesday put him in the category of fielders who have had epic moments in the autumn.
lead_paragraph: Curtis Granderson’s two great catches against the Tigers on Tuesday put him in the category of fielders who have had epic moments in the autumn.

headline.main: Granderson’s Catches Add to October Lore
headline.print_headline: Granderson’s Catches Add to October Lore
headline.seo: Granderson’s Catches Add to October Lore
